title: Kingfisher Leisure Centre Now Saving with EuroSite Power (American DG Energy Inc)
text: ( Source : American DG Energy Inc) WALTHAM, Mass. , Oct. 15, 2015 / PRNewswire / -- EuroSite Power ™ Inc. , ( OTCQB : EUSP) an On-Site Utility ™ solutions provider, offering clean electricity, heat, hot water and cooling solutions to healthcare,
